name: Kirby Sumo
description:
Kirby Sumo was an idea for a top down arena brawler originated from several iterations and experiments.

This 2 player videogame can be a lot of fun when you and your friend brawl out to see who can keep the other player out

Controls:

Player1:

WASD - Movement
Space - Dash/Push

Player2:

Arrow Keys - Movement
NumEnter - Dash/Push

Disclaimer:

Kirby is the propriety of Hal Laboratory and Nintendo. 

Kirby Sumo is currently considered finished despite it's existing bugs. With it's due interest i may or may not continue the project and fix it. Thank you!
